channel.title: RSC Revival on RSC angel source come play!
channel.description:
Hey everyone, i wanna start by saying that i never quit on anyone and this time around im going to pick my staff thoroughly and more responsibly through applications any of the abuse that went on totally unaware of. I was working on switching over to RSCA so sorry for the downtime. We were previously up using the Easy Rsc source which we all know isn't the way to make a server last. So now we are making a second attempt and we are ready to do it the right way.
Updates:
new client colors http://img541.imageshack.us/i/statsvu.png/
portals added
rune rocks mining guild added
New Trade Screen
http://img15.imageshack.us/i/tradewindow.png/
New Duel Screen http://img225.imageshack.us/i/duelscreen.png/
New Town
New Island
New Kbd lair http://img40.imageshack.us/i/kbdi.png/ and alot more that you will have to see in game.
drops for all Npc's from our last source has been added that way economy will be easy going for circulation of rune items.
We Are accepting applications for developers and moderators. as we are doing it all alone me and Drozki that is.. and any rumors floating around about us are fake just a bunch of haters wish us luck!
come play at www.rscr.net
Th4don

Who cares where it came from. No need to flame the topic. The people flaming are only doing it for the sake of it. I doubt most people really give a flying shit where it came from and what they are using.

If anyone wants the editted RSCAngel source they can always private message me.

item.title: RSC Revival on RSC angel source come play!
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“tungi01, post:24, topic:390950”]Th4don didn’t fix the bugs him self but other well known people did. Pomp and many others put alot of work into the source that now is
being used by th4don. Tbh th4don has great ideas and is always adding things to the game to make it fun and unique, only because he didn’t have a great start doesn’t mean everyone has the right to flame him and his server. He is fairly new to the Rsc development and is still learning, wouldn’t hurt to help him out.[/quote]
Pompano may have helped him…but it still doesn’t mean it’s the most stable source. Since we saw what happened to pompanos server.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Revival on RSC angel source come play!
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“th4don, post:22, topic:390950”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=486901.msg3582652#msg3582652 date=1303918736]

Bug fixes my ass, im fairly certain its just the released rsca source + some copy+paste tuts and duel and trade screen recolors… nothing “new” about either of them btw.

i promised to not tell who helped me out but lets just put it this way ill give u a small fucking hint ok noob? lets just say we have the last source that used to have over a 100 players … so do your homework bro you dont know who we are working with if you have nothing nice to say then dont post at all dont talk shit saying my bugs aint fixed when you dont know what the fuck your talkin bout making assumptions to flame my shit we wernt so great in the past but we got a great source now and we need to take advantage of it. . and next time you say your fairly certain go see whats really goin on smart ass you just make yourself look stupid.

You just made yourself look stupid. Having 100 players online at same time doesn’t mean anything, and the source you’re talking about is RSCAngel…which is publicly released on development section.
[/quote]

its the rscangel source with everything fixed and its not the one from the “development section” i got it from someone … listen and maybe you can learn something the source was edited prior to it belonging to me… meaning yes its the same rsc angel source but with a alot changed and added…

and can we cut the flaming to a minimal ? this is a advertisement…[/quote]
Dont make shit up in your advertisement and you wont get flamed… As for your comments, you cant go from stating you dont know what fixes are made because it was “handed down to you” to defending it with how much stuff has been changed. Its obvious you didnt do jack shit to this source based on your comments.

Read full topic

i promised to not tell who helped me out but lets just put it this way ill give u a small fucking hint ok noob? lets just say we have the last source that used to have over a 100 players … so do your homework bro you dont know who we are working with if you have nothing nice to say then dont post at all dont talk shit saying my bugs aint fixed when you dont know what the fuck your talkin bout making assumptions to flame my shit we wernt so great in the past but we got a great source now and we need to take advantage of it. . and next time you say your fairly certain go see whats really goin on smart ass you just make yourself look stupid.
[/quote]
You just made yourself look stupid. Having 100 players online at same time doesn’t mean anything, and the source you’re talking about is RSCAngel…which is publicly released on development section.[/quote]

its the rscangel source with everything fixed and its not the one from the “development section” i got it from someone … read between the lines and maybe you can learn something the source was edited prior to it belonging to me… meaning yes its the same rsc angel source but with a alot changed and added…

and can we cut the flaming to a minimal ? this is a advertisement…
